hide caption BTS performs onstage during the KIIS FM's iHeartRadio Jingle Ball at in 2019. Last year, the South Korean pop group BTS topped the U.S. charts with the blockbuster earworm "Dynamite." Now, they've got a new hit, called "Butter." But the story of K-pop extends well beyond BTS. And it goes back decades with a huge array of styles and sounds. The audio was produced by Mike Katzif and edited by Jessica Reedy. The original version of this episode erroneously stated that the artist BoA was 11 years old when she made her debut in 2000.
